title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error: not a branch
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

package main

func main() {
	var A interface{}
	switch {
	case A:
	}
}

(http://play.golang.org/p/tQWJ-CsQzZ)

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

prog.go:6: cgen: bad type interface {} for NAME
prog.go:6: internal compiler error: patch: not a branch
